channel.title: Automation on RaphGL
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on RaphGL

item.title: Syngit
item.description: Find it on GitHub Syngit is a CLI and init service that let’s you synchronize repositories across different clients (Github, Codeberg, Gitlab, etc) with a very simple interface and configuration file.

item.title: Tuckr
item.description: Find it on GitHub Tuckr is a dotfile manager inspired by Stow and Git. Tuckr aims to make dotfile management less painful.
